ow.routing.impl での RoutingService の使用
 

RoutingService を実装している ow.routing.impl のクラス
 class AbstractRoutingDriver
          The super class of all routing drivers.
 class IterativeRoutingDriver
          A routing driver which performs iterative forwarding/routing/lookup.
 class RecursiveRoutingDriver
          A routing driver which performs recursive forwarding/routing/lookup.
